sources.title: The Drop Kick (1927) Drama, Sport, Silent Film
sources.description:
College football player Jack Hamill finds his reputation on the line when he pays an innocent visit to a woman whose husband kills himself.
 
Director: Millard Webb
Writers: Katharine Brush, Winifred Dunn
Stars: Richard Barthelmess, Barbara Kent, Dorothy Revier & John Wayne (uncredited)
Genres: Drama, Sport, Silent

@CultCinemaClassics:

metadata.Plot: College football player Jack Hamill finds his reputation on the line when tragedy strikes after he pays an innocent visit to a woman.
metadata.Actors: Richard Barthelmess, Barbara Kent, Dorothy Revier
